text: All That Man Is is a 2016 novel by David Szalay. It is a collection of nine, intertwined short stories.http://themanbookerprize.com/books/all-man-by-david- szalay In September 2016, it was shortlisted for the 2016 Man Booker Prize and won the 2016 Gordon Burn Prize. ==Awards and honors== *2016 Man Booker Prize, shortlistee. *2016 Gordon Burn Prize, winner ==References== Category:2016 British novels
title: All That Man Is
